Articles.Content:
What the title says. Anyone got any tips?

Production lines and ressource generation (mines, farms etc.) and transportation, but not only transportation as in Transport Tycoon. Basically something like Settlers or Banished but more detailed and with a currency based economy.

Industry Giant 2. It'll take a bit of work to get it working on modern computers, but it sounds like the same sort of game. You build factories/mines/mills/farms/etc and you set up a transport network to transport the raw material to the factories and transport products and goods to stores that you also build. You can also set up a passenger service if you want. Economy might be a bit lacking but it's alright for such and old game.
